data.title: East Sussex, also online therapy. Appointment on short notice.
data.meta_description: Relationship counselling Horam UK ❤ Are you looking for a good (online) relationship counsellor in Horam - East Sussex? Contact us for marriage, couples and relationship counselling.
data.text:
Bexhill-on-Sea

(11 miles)

Alison | Relationship Counsellor | Bexhill-on-Sea (11 miles)

Relationship Counselling Bexhill-on-Sea, 11 Windmill Drive, TN39 4DG, Bexhill-on-Sea

✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

It can be daunting contacting a counsellor for the first time but I am here to listen, whatever problems you may have and however you're feeling. I am a qualified, BACP accredited, counsellor who offers private and confidential long or short term counselling and relationship counselling in Bexhill.

View profile

Bexhill-on-Sea

(12 miles)

Sue | Relationship Counsellor & Psychotherapist | Bexhill-on-Sea (12 miles)

Couples Counselling Bexhill-on-Sea, TN40, Bexhill-on-Sea

✓ UKCP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I am a humanistic & integrative psychotherapist with over 20 years' experience working with individuals, couples and groups. I am particularly passionate about couples counselling and have worked with couples at various stages of their relationship.

View profile

Hastings

(14 miles)

Anthony | Relationship Counsellor & Therapist | Hastings (14 miles)

Relationship Counselling Hastings, Tower Road West, TN38 0RG, Hastings

✓ COSRT ✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I work with couples and individuals so they may gain self-awareness and understanding.

I provide sessions in-person or via Zoom. I'm able to provide a free 15-minute Zoom or phone call to spend some time discussing your concerns and for us to get a sense of how we might work together.

View profile

Hastings

(16 miles)

Amanda | Couple and Individual Psychotherapist | Hastings (16 miles)

Couples Counselling Hastings, 44 Wellington Square, TN34 1PN, Hastings

✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I’m Amanda and I trained as a psychodynamic individual and couple counsellor and psychotherapist at Tavistock Relationships – recognised nationally and internationally as a leading authority on couple relationships. I specialise in open-ended therapy that will allow you to reflect on past experiences to make sense of the present.

View profile

Tonbridge

(17 miles)

Victoria | Couples Counsellor | Tonbridge (17 miles)

Couples Counselling Tonbridge, TN11 0LZ, Tonbridge

✓ BACP ✓ CPJA ✓ UKCP

✓ I also offer online therapy

Couples counselling can help improve communication and tensions within a relationship. You don’t have to wait until things get really bad or you are considering splitting up to seek therapy. In fact, the earlier you seek help the easier the counselling can be.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Annabel | Couples counsellor | Online (0 miles)

Online Relationship Counselling,

✓ BACP ✓ HCPC ✓ UKCP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I am a fully qualified integrative counsellor and psychotherapist offering online therapy to couples and individuals. Couples counselling can help to improve your relationship by exploring unhelpful dynamics and behaviours, enabling you to share your vulnerabilities and feelings with one another and improve the quality and strength of your relationship. I have the fullest commitment to offering a service that is welcoming to all backgrounds, in a supportive and non-discriminatory manner.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Anna | Online Couples Counsellor | Online (0 miles)

Online couples therapy and counselling,

✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

Hello my name is Anna, and I am passionate about helping people live their lives to their full potential. I work with many issues, including anxiety, personal development and relationship problems.

In couples counselling there is a recognition that relationships are a lot more difficult and take a lot more energy than any of us like to admit. Communication therefore, needs to work well in order to keep a healthy connection and mutual respect, and the process of therapy allows this growth to take place, in a space carved out

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Christina | Online counsellor | Online (0 miles)

Online relationship counselling,

✓ NCPS

✓ I also offer online therapy

Online therapy offers you the flexibility to have sessions at a time and place that suites you. In couples therapy we talk about the issues you are experiencing at the moment and how these problems can be overcome.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Joanne Searle | UKCP Registered Psychotherapist: Couples & Individuals | Online (0 miles)

Online couples counselling,

✓ UKCP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I have been an individual and couples psychotherapist since 1996. I define intimacy in relationship as being emotionally open and physically close. The focus of my work is with individuals and couples who are facing challenges in their relationship(s), and/or who recognize the value of therapeutic input to improve their experience of their relationship(s). I do this by supporting couples in their individual and shared journey to experience true intimacy.

Review: “Finding Jo has been a blessing”

Rating 5 out of 5

based on 1 reviews

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Aryeh | Certified Imago Relationship Therapist | Online (0 miles)

Online Relationship Therapy,

✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

I am a Certified Imago Relationship Therapist and a BACP accredited psychotherapist with 14 years of counselling experience.

I am passionate about helping couples in crisis to rebuild love and connection through improving communication and gaining greater insight into their relationship. I also specialize in overcoming anxiety and anger management.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Heather | CBT Psychotherapist | Online (0 miles)

Online Relationship Therapy,

✓ COSCA

✓ I also offer online therapy

Are you struggling in your relationship? Do you feel stuck but don't know how to change? I can offer a supportive, calm, safe environment for you and your partner to explore your issues together and work towards the best solution. I have been working as a psychotherapist since 2009 both in private practice and as an affiliate CBT Therapist with the NHS as well as several Employee Assistance Programmes. I am also an accredited provider for CIGNA Insurance.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Karen | Imago Relationship Therapist | Online (0 miles)

Online Imago Relationship Therapy,

✓ BACP ✓ NCPS

✓ I also offer online therapy

Married life may no longer feel fulfilling, and once friendly banter may now feel like deliberate attacks. There may be days when you feel as if you have had enough, but then you remember how things used to be, and you stay, because you have hope. If you are ready for a change, and committed to making your hopes into a reality, I am willing and able to support you and your partner.

View profile

Online

(0 miles)

Alicia | Couples Therapist / Individuals Therapist | Online (0 miles)

Online Couples Counselling,

✓ BACP

✓ I also offer online therapy

A warm welcome, whether you are an individual seeking counselling or whether you are wanting sessions with a partner or family member. I am an experienced and accredited couples therapist. I meet with people on line, on Zoom. I welcome clients from all over the UK, as well as overseas.

View profile
